mapper.select: SELECT b.book_name,b.state,u.* FROM (SELECT u.user_id,u.book_id,b.author,b.borrow_date,b.return_date, b.book_pub,b.pub_date,b.category,b.imgurl FROM book_info b , user_book_borrower u WHERE u.user_id=#{userId} AND u.book_id=b.book_info_id) u LEFT JOIN book b ON b.book_id=u.book_id limit #{i},#{y}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book b LEFT JOIN (SELECT u.book_id,b.author,b.borrow_date,b.return_date, b.book_pub,b.pub_date,b.category,b.imgurl FROM book_info b , user_book_borrower u WHERE u.user_id=#{userId} AND u.book_id=b.book_info_id) u ON b.book_id=u.book_id
SELECT * FROM book_info,book HAVING book.book_id=book_info.book_info_id ORDER BY update_time DESC LIMIT 0,4
SELECT * FROM book b,book_info bi WHERE b.book_id=bi.book_info_id AND b.book_id=#{bookId}
SELECT * FROM book b,book_info bi WHERE b.book_id=bi.book_info_id AND bi.category=#{category} and b.book_id!=#{bookId}
SELECT * FROM book b,book_info bi WHERE b.book_id=bi.book_info_id
